text: Ezɨ kamaghɨn gumaziba arɨmariar gumaziba inigha men mɨsiaba ko akuriaba sara me atera izava tuavimɨn mɨriamɨn me arɨsi. Me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim iti, Pitan nedazim me gisɨn mangɨtɨ me ua deragham.(5:15) Gumazamizir kaba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn iti, aruem Pita gisiraghtɨ an nedazim arɨmariar gumazibagh isɨn ikɨtɨ, me ua deragham.
